English: With our monarch on the English throne, talks of formally uniting our two nations have increased dramatically. If united, we will have a stronger economic, military, and naval power-Significant factors needed during the modern age. This is an opportunity for prosperity that should not be missed!
Over the Channel
West Expansion
With the eastern coast of the Adriatic firmly under our grasp, it is now time to look over to the west-The rich territories of Veneto and beyond are aching for our rule! Glory to us!
Demand Milan

The Germans have no claim nor reason to rule over our Cisalpine brothers in Lombardia. Our Italian compatriots are in desparate need for our help-we shall march to Milan and free them once and for all! Glory to Venice!
A Greater Genoa?
As our power grows, we should strive to unite more of the Ligurian coast under our rule. Consolidating the regions of Massa and Lucca would be the first step of that plan. Glory to Genoa!
Expand along the Coast
As Liguria is under our rule, now it is time to expand down the Tyrrhenian coast. The territories of Lazio and Campania will be ours!
Down the Nile

Since the Coptic revolution the Barbarians have fled south. We werent able to beat them at the time , but now we have the strength to do so. We shall annex Nubia and finally prove to the world that we are the true heirs to the Egyptian civilization!
A National Guard
While our Corsaire navy does the job well, no legitimate state can use only pirates for its force projection. It is time we formally incorporate our scattered units into a true standing army.
Reclaim North Africa

As we modernize, people are starting to wonder if our ancestor's dreams of restoring Rome can be truly realized. The first step would to be marching north and restoring the provinces of Roman Africa-even if that means fighting the Berber nomad lords of the Sahara!
Form the kingdom of Morocco
Finally, Morocco is united. The lands are no more split, and now we can form an united front against the Iberians. Glory to the Makhzen!
Form the kingdom of Algeria
Finally, Algeria is united. The lands are no more split, and now we can form an united front against the Iberians. Glory to Jalalatuh!
Renovate the palace of Marrakesh

Now that Morocco is united, we can move onto more long term projects. Morocco has been historically based on the city of Marrakesh, and we seek to continue that tradition. With a new palace, new fortifications, and a new military mission to be built, Marrakesh shall serve us well for our crown.
Pacify the south

The tribes south of the city of Guelmim have always been a thorn on our side. Paying tribute to us half the time and raiding us on the other half, they are both loyal subjects and barbarian menaces. No more. We shall fortify important oasis cities and secure the water near the major wadis. They will bow to us.
The Tunisian hinterlands
Tunis can never be safe from the Berber tribes down south if our borders are so close to the city. We must push south and secure a larger base for our city.
The Constantine hinterlands
Bone can never be safe from the Berber tribes down south if our borders are so close to our treaty port. We must push south and secure a larger base for our port.
The Frisia question
With our Realm united. It is time to strive for our lost lands. Frisians, our kin and compatriots, shall be our first goal.
The purchase of Bergen
The port of Bergen-a Hanseatic kontor, and the last territory in Scandinavia outside our control. The port must be incorporated if we seek to unify Scandinavia. Let us send an offer to the owners.
Down the Danube
The Danube has been an integral part of our nation for a millenium-and they shall be our next goal to be incorporated.
Conquest of Syria
With our growing might we should make a push into the Orient-Those rich provinces will provide us the strength to push into Europa.
Into the holy land
With our growing might we should make a push into the Levant-Those rich provinces will provide us the strength to push into farther Asia.
Recruit militias

While our Standing army is the true cream of the crop, the size is lacking, to say the least. One suggested solution has been to incorporate the fractured militia into the army. While this will dilute the general quality of our troops, this will certainly bolster our numbers.
Unite Hessen

The current borders in the Rhine-Hesse region is a mess, to say the least. With medieval principalities scattered all over the map, it is no wonder one can travel between five states in a single day. It is time to call for a united Hesse-a strong state that can protect all its citizens! Glory to Hesse!
Claim Swabia
The Swabians are the closest kin in greater Germany for us Bavarians-uniting with them will strengthen both our people!
Along the Rhine
From the Alps to the Nordsee, the Rhineland shall be united! A single state would be a massive boost to our commerce, our military and our industry!
Hegemon of Swabia
Sigmaringen and Augsburg-The two missing pieces to our united Swabian realm. No more, we call! We shall unite with those two states and finally proclaim a united Swabia!
Unite Poland and Lithuania

In the late Medieval period, the union of Lublin was rejected between Poland and Lithuania due to meddling of the nobles. This was the greatest geopolitical failure in our history. Only uniting our two weak states is the solution to stopping the Russian and German tide. Glory to Poland-Lithuania!
Unite Poland and Hungary

Poland and Hungary has been historically cordial to each other-but we have never tried to unite our states. But the geopolitcal reality is that we cannot stand parted-it is time to unite our two states and finally proclaim Poland-Hungary!
From City to State
Finally, we have conqueared much of Attica and can proclaim ourselves to be a proper state! Glory to us!
Der Deutsche Zoll Verein

Ideas regarding the Zollverein-a custom union spanning the entirety of Germany-has existed for centuries. However, realpolitik and petty rivalries have stopped its development until now. Now that we have asserted ourselves as one of the formal leaders of Germany, we should take steps to finally implement it.
Deutscher Zoll Verien
Whilest we were never part of the Holy Roman Empire, we cannot risk the isolation from us being outside of it. We shall formally ask the union states for entry.
Unite the Copts

Whilst the idea of an union of Coptic states has existed for centuries, realpolitik and petty rivalries have stopped its development until now. Now that we have asserted ourselves as the spiritual leader of the Coptic faith, we should take steps to finally implement it.
The Murano purchase
The port of Murano, whilst being a minor port for Venice, would be significantly strategic for our landlocked nation. We shall formally ask Venice for the purchase of it.
The Nord Afrika Kompanie
Now that a formal port has been acquired a port, we should build a formal colonial company for administartion of it.
A Danish Pomerania
Pomerania has been historically and culturally close to us. We should protect it from further Northern German aggression.
A Swedish Pomerania
Pomerania has been historically and culturally close to us. We should protect it from further Northern German aggression.
The Saar Boom
Saarland-a land rich in Coal and Iron, and booming with commerce with its tributaries to the Rhine. It will be a great site for our nation's industrial development.
The Land East

Switzerland historically has been wary of expansion. However, the lands of Tirol could be an exeption to that mantra-having close cultural ties and a government structure based on Cantons just like Switzerland, it would be an ideal site for integreation and expansion.
Our former Lands

Anhalt and its surrounding regions were historically connected to us Saxons, but were eventually lost to history. Reclamation of these lost territories is the only answer to how to fix this historical misjustice.
Our Coast

The Sudetes and its surrounding regions were historically connected to us Saxons, but were eventually lost to history. Reclamation of these lost territories is the only answer to how to fix this historical misjustice.
The Nation of the Alps
We are a nation of the Alps, and we should unite all Swabians under our flag. We should expand along the mountains, in order to secure greater lands and population.
Claim Eastern Magna Graecia

Named Magna Graecia, since Ancient times the Calabrian region has been heavily influenced by the Greeks. Even when the city states of Magna Graecia fell, the Hellenic influence has lingered until the modern age in Calabria just like us. Thus, we two provinces should be under one ruler-a true son of the Hellenic world!
Genoese Lands
Genoa has been devastated. Our victory is absolute and we are poised to impose our will upon them. And we shall choose to take the maximum amount of land that we can.
The Coast of Tunis

We need new land for our people, and the Tunisian coast seems like the best option. occupied by the Maghreb tribes, the fertile lands are being underutilized and are unproductive. Transplanting our landless people to those regions would do wonders to both our and the local economy.
The Hungarian Border

Burgenland has always been a sore issue for our Austrian subjects. Lost to Matthias Corvinus, the German people still languish under Magyar rule. Recovering Burgenland would be a propaganda coup, and we will gain support from Austrian subjects like never before. We shall march to Sopron!
The Maghreb Coast
Further expansion must be conducted into the inner Maghreb if we seek to consolidate our holdings.
Proclaim Allemania

Swiss, Badenese, and Lorrainian. Three brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Allemania!
Claim Allemania
Our brothers in Allemania-divided, weak, and in danger of Swabian expansion. We should take them under our wing for their interests, as well as ours.
Claim Allemania
Our brothers in Allemania-divided, weak, and in danger of Bavarian expansion. We should take them under our wing for their interests, as well as ours.
The Griko Questions

The Griko-the decendents of Magna Graecia, the sons and daughters of the Hellenic civilization. They unfortunately still suffer from discrimination and poverty within our nation, despite being as Syracusean as any other. That fact must change if we want to have a united, strong Syracuse.
The Southern People

The Greek populace-traditionally protected, prospered, yet still discriminated under our rule. While our rule has been certainly better than that of the Turk, we still can do much more. For our interests as well as theirs, it is well over time for us to accept them to be Venetian as much as any other.

The Greek populace has been under the Turkish Yoke for millenia. Saddled with Ottoman incompetance, their lands have been devastated and their economy has been lacking. We can do much better than that. Under our rule we can truly grant the Greeks well-deserved prosperity and growth.
Claim Greece
Embrace the Egyptian Arabs

The Misri people make up a substantial population within our nation, yet are subject to discrimination and prejudice. We can do much better than that. For our interests as well as theirs, it is well over time for us to accept them to be our citizens, as much as any other.
Unite Britannia

The isles of Britain already are smaller and underpopulated compared to the European mainland. Yet our petty squabbles dividing our islands make us even weaker. It is past time that we unite under a single flag-the flag of Britannia!

Swiss, Badenese, and Lorrainian. Three brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Allemania!
Unite the Allemans
Form Hispania

Andalucian, Portuguese, Castillian, Galician, Catalan, Asturleonese, and Basque. All brother cultures, coming from the same routes. We must not continue to be split, and we will be much more stronger if we are together. We must unite under a single flag-the flag of Hispania!
Claim Sevilla

Since their subjugation under Castillian rule, the historically Sevilla lands of Andalucia have become a backwater province in Spain. Poor, rural, and divided-it can do much better under our rule! We shall be the rulers of Andalucia!
Claim Sevilla

Since their subjugation under Castillian rule, the historically Sevilla lands of Andalucia have become a backwater province in Spain. Poor, rural, and divided-it can do much better under our rule! We shall be the rulers of Andalucia!
The City of Cadiz

We cannot continue the current status of us being boxed in by the Castillians. We must take the province of Cadiz, giving us a port in the Atlantic and greater avenues of expansion. Whatever the cost would be, we must seize Cadiz!
Lord of Navarra

Since inheriting the Basque throne nominally after the death of Blanche the fifth, the Leonese have been traditionally the de jure rulers of the Basque. However, after the failure of multiple attempts of centralization, we have all but given up our rule of the province. With our rising might, we can take steps to integrate the province again-and finally remove that strategical blunder from the map.
King of the Basques

If we seek to take lessons from history, one place to begin would be how to treat our Basque subjects. They are a proud people, and thinking that they would just accept our rule would be foolish. We shall take steps to show our coming benign rule and truly integrate the Basque as part of our nation.
The south of Portugal

The first Andalucian Caliphate fell because of continuous Portuguese raids. If we seek to truly declare ourselves the heir of Andalucia, we must reduce the Portuguese crown into merely a shadow, and remove that threat once and for all.
The Algerian Coast

Another reason the Andalucian Caliphate fell was invaders from the Maghreb, especially from Tamasna. Expanding into regions such as Fez and Taza would be great steps to ensure that never happens again.
Reform Al-Andalus

We have shown the world that we are a rising power. We have achieved prosperity and military strength. It is past time that we use that earned prestie for good use, and declare ourselves the true succesors of Al-Andalus!
Master of the Maghreb

Another reason the Andalucian Caliphate fell was invaders from the Maghreb, especially from Tamasna. Expanding into regions such as Fez and Taza would be great steps to ensure that never happens again.
Colonize Kannata
With the growing population, our nation has the capacity to tame the wild plains and tundra of Kannata. Now, it is time to make those claims to be official.
Colonize Kannata
With the growing population, our nation has the capacity to tame the wild plains and tundra of Kannata. Now, it is time to make those claims to be official.
Retake Neu Lubeck

Neu Lubeck was one of the first colonies settled by european settlers in the new world. A historically and economically important region, any nation taking it can dominate the other in North America. We must stake our claim to it, no matter the cost.
Administrate Hai'l and Riyadh
Ha'il and Riyadh are the only populated regions in the Arabian desert able to be called a city. Excellent sites for our growing administration, they must be taken if we want to tame Arabia.
Restore Lega Lomarda

The lands of northern Italy are populated by one people, have a common market and an united economy, and protect each other. We are united in all but name. It is time to make that union formal and proclaim ourselves as a powerful state, able to stand up against other powers such as Naples, France and Bavaria.
No, el nostre mar

Long ago the Seas of the Mediterranian have been ours. However, the Genoan pirates pilfered our rightful sea from us! Now that us Venetians have amassed enough power to challenge their domination, let us return to being an player in the Mediterranean Game
Take the Sand

The Deserts of Fayyum and the Sahara el Beyda are strategical dangers to our state. With our control of those lands, we can never claim to fully protect our citizens from Maghrebi raids. We must establish outposts and garrisons to patrol that territory.
Push to the great River
Sgirur needs resources for its economy, and Goias can provide. Taking and developing the Copper, iron and gold mines on our border would be a great boon to our economy.
Return to Normandy

Since the conquest of William the great, Normandy and England has always had a close relationship. The cultural, economic, and commercial ties between us two regions cannot be ignored-and uniting our two regions would be a great step forward in expanding upon that relationship.
Claim Brittany

Brittany is populated by another branch of the Celts-the Bretons. Under constant pressure from their French overlords for assimilation, they yearn for independence and their own cultural identity. And we can provide it.
Claim Galicia

Galicia is populated by another branch of the Celts-the Galego. Under constant pressure from their Spanish overlords for assimilation, they yearn for independence and their own cultural identity. And we can provide it.
Request Marque Letters

As the only pirate nation in the world we are not well regarded by many countries. But we can try to change that by putting ourserlves at the service of the Amauldi. This way we would get protection, but they will gain more influence on our affairs. A price we are willing to pay, for our independence.
Incorparate Vassals

As the waves of German nationalism get higher and higher, demands of us uniting with our subject states and proclaiming ourselves as a candidate for unification have grown. As we do stand for gain from that arrangement, we should use this opportunity.
Expell Christians to Columbia

With the rising threat of Christians in our country have angered and worried our nobles. Some have suggested the Idea of expelling them to another continent-to South America. While this is certainly an extreme idea, this will solve all of our problems.
Annexation of the four border tribes

Since our independence, we have used auxiliary forces from the four border tribes of the Hopi, the Navajo, the O'odham, and the Zuni to guard our borders. However, our population has grown and now we do not need the additional troops. We shall march west and seize their lands instead.
Restore Byzantium
We have proven ourselves to be worthy succesors to Byzantium-and we will use the territorial claims from that successor status to our advantage.
Our Claims on Burma

We have beaten back the Chinese rebels, we have beaten back the Buyeo false Emperor. Now, we have proven ourselves as the rightful rulers of all Tibeto-Burmans, and we shall use our claim to strengthen our dominion
Lord of the Himalaya's
With our People and Nation always being stationed in the Himalaya mountains, we shall expand to take all of them
Lord of the plains
With our nomad ancestry we could go back to the plains where we come from
Lord of the steppe
Our Nomad brothers stroll around in the desert and as we claimed the mountains and the plains, they are the only region we have right to push in
Opium trade in the Yangtze

The revolt of the three Feudatories have resulted in a weakened Buyeo control of the Yangtze delta, a region close to the ports of Kaohsiung and Ke-lang. Thus, exploiting the lack of policing and further weakening the Buyeo, our merchants have started to conduct in the opium trade in the Yangtze delta. While this is highly immoral, nationalizing this trade will result in serious profits for our treasury. But is money worth angering the tiger?
Our Claims on Tibet

We have beaten back the Chinese rebels, we have beaten back the Buyeo false Emperor. Now, we have proven ourselves as the rightful rulers of all Tibeto-Burmans, and we shall use our claim to strengthen our dominion
The Florida Purchase

A land of Swamps and forests, Florida is a backwater province for the Amauldi-but the only mainland region we can even fathom to hold. We can pay to buy those lands-and finally solve a dispute between us two states.
Claim Karib
A part of the Caribbean island chain, the island of Karib is of course part of our realm. It is time to end the rebel hold of the lands and finally unite the island chain.
Abolish Slavery in $COUNTRY$
Abolitionism, or the abolitionist movement, was the movement to end slavery. As calls for Abolitionism increase in our nation, it's time for us to abolish the inhuman practice of slavery
Educate the North Amazon Tribes

When we first came to Columbia we thought that all the natives would have came to us to ask about our Lord and saviour. We had failed that goal. But we can try again and again, as the lord is the most forgiving.
Control the Amazon
The Amazon River is partially navigable and it could be of great use to reach every indigen with the Holy Word.The only issue is that some hostile uncivilized infidels own that land
Take Bel覆
The Genoese have sinned by exploiting natives instead of teaching them.Therefore their lands would come more well used by us
Proclaim the Holy War for Quito
It's our role to protect the Catholic minority in the Incan Empire from the Incans' Satanic mix of cults and beliefs.Deus Vult!
Weaken the Scottish Heretics
We shall weaken the Scottish heretics in the south.Taking the lands South of Guyana and Bel覆 would be a great idea as they wouldn't stretch our borders too much.
The Holy Needle
By starting a nation-wide vaccination campaign we can increase the qualiry of life of our citizens and decrease child mortality
The Water of Life
Medicine has made great progresses that we should integrate in our healthcare system
Estabilish more Jesuit Schools
We are known as the people of enseignants and therefore our schools have to be excellent and capillar around our territory
Annex Ngabe
We have gained enough control over Ngabe and now they can't refuse a proposal of annexation
Re-establish the Kontors
With our resurgent power we should bring back the Hanseatic kontors and bring back their merchants
Reinstate New World Kontors

Not so long ago,Cities like Nuevelle Paris and Sankt Johann have become so called 'New World Kontors' due to having Kontor-esque trading posts. Because both cities have become significant center of commerce, we could give them the title of Kontor
For a long time, Kontors have been extraterritorial lands which is not officially part of the Hanse.So while it rains and pours we should take whats ours and take some more!
Integrate the Kontors
Proclaim yourself King of the Gauls
Long have the Guals been struggeling under the Spaniards,Germans and the Dutch.They live in near Disapora except of course us.The Coranation is ready!
Unite the Gauls
You, as king of the Gauls, should own all of the gallo-roman lands directly
Claim Neu Stettin, Friedensland and the Pueblo Vassals

The Alemana slaves in Karib island, buffeted by their successful great revolt, have recently sailed to the lands north of our great river to punish their former masters. We should stabilize this wild north by subjugating it.
Return of the German Aristocrats
Czechs are Germans, but for long that has been in question as wee have been part of the Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation.We left it for being german ,but now is the time to return!
Renovatio Imperii

The Roman empire fell, the Byzantine empire fell only the Holy Roman empire is holding on ,barely.With us getting every german Nation under controll we can proclaim what should hav e been lost to time.Renovatio Imperii anyone?
Reclaim Silesia
The Saxons took Silesia away from us not so long ago.It has been in Bohemian hands for over half a millenia before
Reintegrate Bohemia
Bohemia has been part of the Holy Roman empire for so long, ist hard to remember it without it.So now with Bohemia in controll of Germans once again, we could integrate it into the second reich
Rename New Rome
These ancient lands are truly roman
Palzer칙춵
Es ist Zeit den Palzern zu zeigen wie wir ihre Stadt sehen
German Constantinople
We have seized the city of the world's desire! We shall rename it as further proof of our control.
German Savoie
We have seized the strategic Savoie region! We shall rename it as further proof of our control.
Rename the Western Alps
We have seized the strategic region of the Western Alps! We shall rename it with German names as further proof of our control.
Rename the Western Alps
We have seized the strategic region of the Western Alps! We shall rename it with French names as further proof of our control.
Rename Burgundy
We have seized the prosperous region of Burgundy! We shal rename it with French names as further proof of our control.
Restore Greater Burma
We are now strong enough to retake the lands that were once under the rule of the Burmese Empire.
Annex the Shan Saw Bwars
Even though the Shan Saw Bwars are loyal to the Burmese we have to give the less autonomy if we want a more centralized government. We shall directly control the Shan States from now.
Partition of Bohemia
Bavaria owns the Bohemian homeland and we should capitalize on this.
From the Tibeto-Burman Union
We have united all the Tibeto-Burmans under our dynasty. We shall form the Tibeto-Burman Union
From the Tibeto-Burman Union
We have united all the Tibeto-Burmans under our dynasty. We shall form the Tibeto-Burman Union
Reclaim Frisia
The Carnolian lands have been historically part of our domain, but the Cilli counts have pilfered it from us. We should take action to rectify that historical mistake.
Consolidate Krain
The East Frisian lands have been historically part of our domain, but the Dutch have pilfered it from us. We should take action to rectify that historical mistake.
We lost Venice
We lost our beautiful capital of Venice so it doesn't make sense we call ouself the Venetian Republic.How about Republic of San Marco?
We lost Genoa
We lost our capital of Genoa so it doesn't make sense we call ouself the Genoese Republic.How about Tirrenian Republic?
Return of Venice
Venice is once again part of our nation ,we can finally return to former glory and rename ourself to Venice once again
Return of Genoa
Genoa is once again part of our nation ,we can finally return to former glory and rename ourself to Genoa once again
Into the Turan Depression

The Kazakh steppes has always posed a problem to Russia. Countless Hordes have occupied it since time immemorial, and have raided greater Russia based from it. However, the tables have turned. The Nogai horde are now all but our subjects, and we have the authority to lay claim to their hinterlands. To Uralsk!
Annexation of Kazakhstan
Russia needs more land for her people, and the Kazakh rump state stands open for colonization. We shall abolish the failing monarchy and build the Governorate of the Steppes to serve all of Russia.
Annexation of Bukkhara

Bukkhara is too rich of a land for it to be languishing under the backwards monarchy. The khan can be bribed with an estate and some gold, and we shall add the lands into the Governorate of Central Asia.
Claim Moldavia
The rump state of Transnistria has been continuously failing the Ruthenyan population it claims to rule over. That comes to an end today. We shall claim Transnistira once and for all.
Claim Bryansk

Bryansk has always been a sore point between Russia and Lithuania. With Smolenskians making up the majority of the rural population, the Lithuanian urban majority with the Ruthenyans weighing in on thier side has been the only obstacle in our control of the region. Now that we own White Ruthenia, that territory can be integrated into our realm.
Into Azov

Azov has always been on the site for us. Tho a minor port for world standards, it is the only port in the Black sea that has been at least cordial with us. With increasing control over the hinterlands, now finally may be the moment to make the move.
The Annexation of Nogai
Russia needs more land to grow, and the rump state of Nogai seems like our best bet. Russian immigration into their lands have already started, and we will make sure it continues.
The Emancipation of Ruthenyans

Ruthenyans make up the vast majority of our population, but are treated like second class citizens. This cannot continue. We must stem Ruthenyan nationalism if we want to survive as a nation, and the first step is to treat them equally as Polish citizens.
The Polish-Hungarian-Ruthenyan Commonwealth

Hungary and Poland cannot stand separated. While Poland may be weaker than Bavaria and the wider German sphere and Hungary is weaker than Venice, we are stronger together. A commonwealth of Poles, Lithuanians, and Ruthenyans can challenge any great power!
Unite the Amazon
A few states in the middle of the jungle no more.We should unite!
Incorparate Muntafiq
Our vassal in Mesopotamia has been an important part of our emprie and with our increasing push for centralization , we should start with them
Centralize the Karlani Empire
Our might has been weakened and there is only one reason for it.Our decentralizatrion is at fault
Annex Armenia
Its time to centralize more and more of our Nation
Annex our Arabian Vassal
Our vassal in Arabia has been an important part of our emprie and with our increasing push for centralization .We should start with them
Integrate Aragon
With the Aragonese in our Hands ist time to annex them and make them an integral part of our nation
Join the Holy Roman Empire
Whilest we aren't part of the empire, with our geographical and cultural location they cannot reject this offer
Burgundy Expansion
Our Realm is strong and has room for expansion.With many Burgundians in our dominion we could go after their kingdom
The Lands West
With Burgundy secured.We need to secure more french ,but geographically important lands.
The Northern Menace
Luxembourg has long threatened our western german hemogony and have claims on the Saar
Lorrainian Natural Borders
Our Dominion and Realm are the most secxure in Europe, the northern Border isnt very defendable.Lets fix that!
Claim Ingriya
We have consolidated our heart lands.Let's get some more 'heart land'
With our capture of Ingriya we can finally return to our former selfs
Crusade for the Coast
Give supplies to England
Looks like the English are having a civil war, if the Westminsters win we will have a Dutch puppet on our border, we can't let this happen. Send Supplies to England!
Claim Brandenburg
Almost all Saxon lands are now under our rule, the only ones left is  pesky Brandenburg
Unite the Bishoprics
For long , the Bishoprics of german descend have been disunited.Its has come time to change that.
Claim the Central Columbia
We already are the strongest in the Central Columbia region so why not unify it?
Make Friends with the Pirates
Us and the pirates share a common enemy, The Genoense, we should work together and beat them.
Become Denmark
As we lost Norway, we have no right to call ourselves 'Denmark-Norway' anymore
The Duchy of Holstein
There are Danes over in Holstein who aren't being represented by the Hanseatic government.WE should Liberate them
German Expansion
We need to have a stronghold in Germany to show our german Hegemony
Claim Karelia
There stre finns under Russin oppresion over in Karelia, we need to protect them!
Enable ToL Non-Dynamic Revolts
This option enables non-Dynamic revolts, as they rarely happen.This option does NOT disable Dynamic Revolts
Join the Hanseatic League
With growing german national sentiment we shopuld do something oursself
Edict on Daimin gokuo

As the events of Satsuma shock have shown, there is ample benefits to be had from learning from our southern colony of Sainantan. From their surprisingly advanced military to their economy, we have much to learn. Breaking from tradition, we shall issue an edict on the movement of Daimin Gokuo, or "Ask the people, inform the Emperor".
Become Prussia
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our name...
Become Latvia
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our name칙춵
Become Estonia
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our name칙춵
Become Memelland
We lost our former home lands, we don't deserve our name칙춵
Unite with the Saarland
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Unite with Aragon
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Unite with Occitania
Our two Nations are so similar ,that it makes sense to merge both states into one
Unite with Illyria

Iwakura Mission

The Iwakura Mission or Iwakura Embassy was a Japanese diplomatic journey around the world, initiated in $YEAR$ by the oligarchs of the Meiji period. Although it was not the only such ""mission"", it is the most well-known and possibly most important for the modernization of Japan after a long period of isolation from the West. It was first proposed by the influential Dutch missionary and engineer Guido Verbeck and was probably based on the model of the Grand Embassy of Peter I. The purposes of the mission were twofold: To renegotiate the unequal treaties with the Great Powers that Japan had been forced into during the previous decades and to gather information on education, technology, culture, and military, social and economic structures from the countries visited in order to effect the modernization of Japan.
